name: 李昭賢
objective:
1. 專題報告；
2. 專題演講；
3. 研究小組討論。
schedule:
1. 依排定週次以PPT報告研究進度。
2. 依電子所排定週次聆聽專題演講。
scorePolicy:
1. Special Topic Speeches: (40%) #1 ~ #5. (One-page report per speech)
2. Special Topic Readings: (30%) #A、#B、#C. (One-page report per reading)
3. Group Meeting: (20%) Presentation on surveying papers. (PPT 6-8 pages, 8-10 min.).
4. Attendance: (10%).
